results.title: Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: After 3 months of treatment, her hemoglobin level had increased to 11.4 g/dL without additional treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Anemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000740 @@@anemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Kubo T, Kitaoka H, Terauchi Y, Tamura S, Okawa M, Yamasaki N, Yabe T, Doi YL. Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy. J Cardiol. 2010 Jan;55(1):125-9. PMID: 20122559
citations.BibTeX: @article{20122559, title={Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy.}, author={Kubo T and Kitaoka H and Terauchi Y and Tamura S and Okawa M and Yamasaki N and Yabe T and Doi YL}, journal={J Cardiol}, volume={55}, number={1}, pages={125-9}}

results.title: Thalidomide-induced sinus bradycardia.
results.text_hl: CASE SUMMARY: A 72-year-old white man, with transfusion-dependent refractory @<m>DISEASE_Anemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000740 @@@anemia@@@ with @DISEASE_Ring_Chromosomes @DISEASE_MESH:D012303 @@@ringed sideroblasts@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, was started on @CHEMICAL_Thalidomide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013792 @@@thalidomide@@@ 100 mg at bedtime.

citations.NLM: Kaur A, Yu SS, Lee AJ, Chiao TB. Thalidomide-induced sinus bradycardia. Ann Pharmacother. 2003 Jul-Aug;37(7-8):1040-3. PMID: 12841816
citations.BibTeX: @article{12841816, title={Thalidomide-induced sinus bradycardia.}, author={Kaur A and Yu SS and Lee AJ and Chiao TB}, journal={Ann Pharmacother}, volume={37}, number={7-8}, pages={1040-3}}
